website_summaries.verdict: An affordable bathing suit that will flatter your figure and your wallet.
pros: Soft, breathable material with beautiful mesh detailing
Available in black or army green colors
Sits at a lower price point than its competitors without compromising on quality
High-waisted bottoms provide some tummy control
cons: Bathing suit top could provide more support

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: I used this swimsuits on a vacation to Jamaica and got so many compliments on it. It fits nice the top was a little big but it still fit well. I plan on ordering with them again very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kayland

customer_reviews.title: So flattering!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big girl & have never worn a two piece in my life. I found this & decided to take a risk because my friends have been encouraging me to step out of my comfort zone. I’m so glad I did! Probably gonna get it in different colors too. It’s comfy & flattering & I actually FEEL confident wearing it which NEVER happens! Such a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: rilla1130

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This suit is so cute!!! I’m normally a 14-16 and ordered the XXL because i was worried about the bottomed being too tight and looking funny. Well, the suit ended up being too large but it was still wearable. I wore this in Los Cabos, Mexico and I received so many compliments! I love this suit so much and i am buying it in another color and a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Chokor

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Very nice swimsuit. I like how comfortable it is but the only thing I don’t like personally is how high waisted it is. I’m 5’8 and 190 lbs. My cup size is a 38C but I usually wear a medium top. And the top is definitely perfect. My butt is rather large, I wear a size 12 in curvy jeans and a size large or xl in pants. The bottoms are so comfortable, they just go too high up for my liking. I ordered an XL in purple
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Cute design, and works for large chests. The color runs, though.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I'm happy. I ordered several suits, and this was the only one that covered enough of my chest to even consider. I do have concerns about fading, though. I've only worn it once, but when I rinsed it out after going to the river, the water turned the color of the suit immediately. I wonder how it's going to look at the end of the season? I wish the bottoms were more structured, but they fit well and cover everything I want covered. Not sure if this would be good for someone that's a really active swimmer. I'm more of a lounger, though, so for me it offers enough support.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathing suit and cannot wait to wear it on vacation! I ordered a 3xl and it fit me perfectly. I am 5'4", weigh 250+lbs, bra size 42F (i think its the same as 42DDD?). Nothing was tight and the material did stretch. I do wish there was a bit more support on the top but i dont feel like the girls are going to fall out. I just might have adjust every once and a while but its not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: j. sonderman

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!!
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is so cute! It fits exactly as described. Really flattering since the bottom is not high cut like alot of popular bathing suits. I have a hanging stomach and this suit hides it well. The top also covers the stomach from the front while leaving a little at the sides and back revealed. Love it. Don't hesitate and buy it. I am 5'9" 224lbs and I ordered the XXL size 16 and it fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tara Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but top is too big.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the suit. My only problem was the top was too big. (I wear a 36DD or 36DDD) The top fit fine across the shoulders, however there are no under wires in the top and the cups are movable. The band under the burst area was too large and I was worried my boobs would be hanging out the bottom lol. If I wore the top with a strapless bra and removed the cups, it would have been perfect, but I'm looking for a swimsuit, so i returned it. Unfortunately it does not come any smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Not for women with larger than average chest sizes.
customer_reviews.text: love the color. unfortunately top doesn't give much support for bigger busted women. with a 44h bra size it fit over my chest but is more aesthetically pleasing than functional. not like i'm doing laps back and forth but even with just submerging my body in the water the top started to life and i could with enough movement it would definitely lift up and expose. the bottoms fit fine, however
customer_reviews.author: bumblebree

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan of high waist swim suits but I decided to give this a try. Fits me very well and is true to size. I do wish the straps were thinner since I do get a weird tan line from them but other than that a good quality suit that surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sexy momma! Cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and looked lovely on me. My daughter's thought I looked so good in this suit. I have extremely large breasts so finding a swim top is a challenge and this worked out well for me. The color was nice. Straps were included but I wasn't too sure about them. I did cross them b.c they looked odd straight and they would undo themselves. Definitely couldn't wear off the shoulder bc it was too tight and I didn't like that look anyway. They are removable in case you don't want them on at all. The top was very comfortable and I felt comfortable in the entire swimsuit. I felt sexy as well for being overweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love!!
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love my swimsuit! needed something for my trip to Thailand, package came right on time! I was afraid it was gonna fit small but it fits perfectly. i’m 5’5 195lbs...I ordered a 14(xl). I probably could’ve ordered the Large but glad I went a little bigger because i’m slightly bloated lol. but it’s comfy and no flaws. super flattering for all body types...the small straps detach which was perfect because I actually didn’t care for em but still really cute. will definitely order more from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Rocked this swimsuit in Jamaica 💛
customer_reviews.text: I am a Plush pal, 5'11 278# lots of hips, thighs, and butt...and it is sometimes finding swimwear that is cute but comfortable and curve flattering. Plush gals want to be sexy too! This little number was a hit! I got it in a 3X Pros: Vibrant color. Cute and comfy. Top can double as a cute crop which was good for leaving the pool and eating at a poolside restaurant. Cons: Stains are easily noticed. Like from sitting on the concrete or other surface. Ruffle flap does blow in the wind easily but it wasn't a nuisance to me. Overall I was pleased and would be again!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great for moms, hide your mom tummy but makes you feel pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I love this swim suit! I have not had much luck with swimsuits in the past and this made me feel pretty good. I typically dont swim unless on vacation where i know no one, but i may feel ok comfortable wearing this around people i know. I am 5’9 38DD 185lbs shirt size XL and pants 12/14. I got an XL. Fits very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: I will continue to wear it as it made me feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 14/16 with a very large chest size of 38G. I ordered the XXL. While it was a little small in the top and a bit to big in the bottoms. It fit as expected. The draping in front helped to hide the to small band underneath. I will continue to wear it as it made me feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley the Elley

customer_reviews.title: Front sexy, back frumpy. ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I love the front of this suit! It’s cute and fun! However the back is a train wreck! The long ruffle from the front stops at the shoulders vs going all the way around. Which looks dumb and incomplete. The model shows the suit as an off the shoulder but mine definitely fit like a vneck, and wouldn’t stay if I pull it off the shoulders even though there was plenty of room. I am so disappointed cause I love the front of this suit, but the back looks unfinished and frumpy. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Purchase....Don’t Think Twice
customer_reviews.text: Omg what is there to not LOVE about this swimsuit? I am a very big girl. I wear a size 22-24 and this swimsuit makes me feel so sexy. It shows skin, but not in places that are embarrassing. It shows skin in really sexy way and the fit is so flattering. I can’t wait to wear this is Puerto Rico!
customer_reviews.author: S_Kay

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I got my suit, I tried it on hoping it would fit. My first thought was it's going to ride up my bum. Second thought was the top would be too big. But, to my surprise, it fits so well! The top sets nicely on my shoulders and the bottoms stay put!! I absolutely love this bathing suit and I'm hoping I can get different designs next time. I ordered an XL. I am 5'0 and 193lbs. Chest size is 38B and it fit so nicely. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Davis

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars because it’s not off-the-shoulder
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. The 4 stars, however, is because it’s not really off-the-shoulder at all. It won’t even go over my shoulders and stay for a second. It looks cute as a v-neck though if I remove the straps. If it weren’t for the arms, I could’ve ordered a size down. I’m a size 20W and it fits well and is flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Jer & Brit Laboy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: All the comfort of a two piece with the coverage of a one piece. If you have a particularly large bust like me, you might find yourself battling some overflow, the bottoms will roll a bit if you dive, and the loose edge of the top will float and get in your way a bit while moving in the water, but it looks cute as heck and it's perfect if you prefer to lay on the beach or just casually swim around. It was a perfect buy for my lake trip.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: not for me but a great deal
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky about bathing suits, I wear an xl on top or size 16 and medium on bottom or size 8. I selected this because the orange looked a bit like a coral. When it arrived I knew it wasn't for me, it is FLUORESCENT orange. The style is very cute though, I didn't try it on as I already planned to return it. I will look for a substitute that sells the pieces separate as I already know the bottoms would have not fit.
customer_reviews.author: LanaQ

customer_reviews.title: I did love the swimsuit overall
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 2X that was way too big, but that was my mistake. With swimsuits I usually tend to buy them larger, but the bottoms on this swimsuit went over my waist and sat just right under my chest. I did love the swimsuit overall, the fabric was great quality, I didn't feel that it was transparent or that I would have any issues with it once it got wet. I will likely order a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathing suit! so cute! however, the top was slightly bigger! I’m a size 3x so that’s what I ordered I also have a big butt so that’s why I ordered this size. I also have bigger breast as well I’m and E and this was still A very loose top so there’s no pick up of the girls. But while swimming I had none of the girls get out of there assigned seats so that’s a major plus! All around love this suit and probably will be ordering in a diff color!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna thierry

customer_reviews.title: Best swimsuit I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best swimsuit I’ve ever had. So flattering and comfortable and sexy and fits perfectly. I ordered a large and I’m 5’3 and 215 lbs with 40DDD chest. My only complaint would be there’s not much support in the chest area, but the ruffles cover that so it’s okay and still looks nice. I took out the padded bra inserts because they just don’t stay in place and it’s more comfortable without them. But overall such a great suit and pretty color and I always get lots of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Choose Size Carefully
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I did not give 5 stars is the fit. I am US 18/40DDD and ordered XXL. It's a bit loose in some places, but I think if I ordered a smaller size, it would dig in instead of suck me in. Also the bottoms don't fit as shown... they're not that long and the net stripes going across the model's hips are closer to the front. I am very comfortable with myself, so I do not have any problems wearing this confidently, but others might since it doesn't do you any favors.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I freaking love it!!! I’m so self conscious about myself in bathing suits, but this fits like a dream! The coloring is exactly how I expected, it’s comfortable, and very flattering! I will buy this in another color too, because, it’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: MrsConklin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fantastic bathing suit, I was excited to go to the river just so I could wear it! That’s saying a lot as I’m at the highest weight in my life. Shopping for swimwear has always been tough, but this is just so vivid and flattering. I got many compliments and was truly feeling myself, lol. If you think you might like it go for it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael B

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit and color
customer_reviews.text: I like the swimsuit. It was exactly what i was looking for. The color is nice and bright and flattering. The strength is wonderful and it’s very comfortable. I read the size part and order base on my measurements and it fits perfectly. The only reason I gave 4 stars was due to the shipping. I was very disappointed that wasn’t able to bring on my mini trip.
customer_reviews.author: Denesha

customer_reviews.title: Actual plus size bathing suit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathing suit! The only complaint I have is the underside of the ruffle around the top is actually white without any print. Doesn’t seem like it would be an issue until you’re trying to take pictures on the beach in the wind LOL super super cute and the straps are removable which is great. I wear a size 18 in Old Navy rockstar jeans. I am bottom heavy and bought a xxl!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: So cute and flattering!
customer_reviews.text: Im so insecure about my tummy and i have yet to find a two piece that makes me comfortable until today! Can I just say how much I love this suit! If you are having second thoughts, JUST DO IT! I promise you, you wont be disappointed!! The other reviews are correct in saying it wont stay off your shoulder. As soon as you move they come up but its still very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't great for me, but it was great for my daughters girlfriend.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, pretty decent quality. Though it did not fit me well. I guess my shape just is not right for it. Thats okay. My daughters girlfriend fit it just fine. She has a hard time finding swim wear that fits well. So she was ecstatic to get a nice, new and really cute swim suit for the summer. Me? I ordered something different. Lol. But I'm overall happy with my purchase, even if it didn't fit me and my shape well.
customer_reviews.author: BMWK

customer_reviews.title: No chest support.
customer_reviews.text: No chest support. I'm 5'2, 230ish lbs, 44DDD... I'm a big girl and apparently much less perky than others that love this. Cute suit, but my pliable chest spread out in this- no lift, no shape... nothing but medium sized pad inserts to lay across my floppy chest. Not flattering on me at all. Tried 3 different brands on here all claiming to be plus size friendly and was disappointed in each for this same reason. Very cute otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I love it overall it fits amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love it overall it fits amazing. It just kept sliding up on my shoulders I got the 4x(20) and I’m 5’7 280
customer_reviews.author: Swagbarbie1

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the good reviews over this bikini I decided to try my luck and order one, never been so disappointed! I’m a size 14 in jeans and XL in tops, a lot of the reviews with my same sizes order XL so did I. The shipping was great but the bikini itself is awful lol the top is HUGE! The bottoms are way little. It’s honestly like the pieces are two completely different sizes. Returning for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, very vivid color!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute two-piece. It did just what I wanted it to do which was to disguise my stomach area. It's very noticeable because of the bright yellow color. If I were to order this again, I would actually order a size down (maybe even two sizes down for a tighter fit). You can notice the looseness around my arm and chest area. I'm about 220lbs. I usually wear 16/18 in pants which is why I went with the XXXL/US18. Definitely a cute two-piece. Side note: I got my colorful cover-up from amazon as well for only $12.98.
customer_reviews.author: Meeka

customer_reviews.title: Top good bottom not
customer_reviews.text: Ok so first I’m 5’7” and 200 pounds. I got the XXL size 16. The top fit perfectly. My bras are 40B or 40Cs. The bottom was too tight on my love handles. I squished out in bad spots and usually I’m a 34 waist. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: A.L

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all.
customer_reviews.text: This suit is comfortable and affordable. the only issue I have are the gaps on the bottom, and that is probably just because of my height and weight. I read other reviews and followed their lead, and it was a good idea, I'm just shorter, haha. I'm 5 ft 5 and 270. I got the biggest size that fits a size 20 because my midsection is bigger. As I said, it fits, it just has these little gaps.
customer_reviews.author: Taj

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but.
customer_reviews.text: There are a couple things that I did not like about the suit. First, the ruffle does not go all the way around. Second, the top isnt made to be off shoulder so if you raise your arms, it pops right back up. Third, the top has absolutely no support. I wear a 42DD & 22 - I got the 4x.
customer_reviews.author: MrsKres2k17

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this bathing suit. I normally wear a size 18 so I purchased a 3x. Once it finally arrived ( I have prime so it should've arrived in 2 days but it took 5) I tried it on and was seriously disappointed. It fit wrong in all kinds of ways. The top was ok but the bottom made me look like an Oompa Loompa. I've purchased a bathing suit from Amazon before and was in love so not all hope is lost. This was just not the one.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lopez-Fuston

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Buy different bottoms.
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms are not flattering. They offer no smoothing for stomachs or anything. The top is ok. The padding is pretty small and slides around. But it has good coverage. I'll definitely have to get a different pair of bottoms. Overall pretty disappointed. (Review is under my husband, we share an Amazon)
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: I’m excited
customer_reviews.text: I brought the bathing suit for my birthday. I went a size up because I have huge breast so I got a 2XL AND it fits perfect and it doesn’t show all my rolls lol....can’t wait to get in my hot tub. Also I brought it in yellow and I’m about to get another color lol...arrived when it was supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Keisha White

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful blue swimwear that gives you the support you need.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this swim suit in blue. In person the color is a little different than shown. Still very pretty. The top fits perfectly and that's hard for me to find a swim suit that gives me support. Over all I would say this is a good suit if you are looking for something to be high waisted, cover your tummy. Give your chest the support it needs. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Super pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning one size to go up to this one because the top was a little snug on me. I am a 38 DD and size 16. The bottoms were fine. I really like both, but bought the suit to mix and match. I wore this top with pink bottoms and got so many compliments! The color I think is much brighter than the pictures for the purple, but I was actually happy about it. It’s beautiful! Very flattering fit!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok Curvy Ladies! This suit is so cute and flattering that you won't need to wear a coverup when you hit the beach! I loved it so much I bought two so that I would have an extra when I wear this one out! Nicely made. Not expensive but absolutely not a cheap feeling suit and best of all, it looks great!!!! A Must Have!
customer_reviews.author: Jeaninski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love, I am a curvy plus size and this is very trendy and flattering.
customer_reviews.author: TED LEMEK

customer_reviews.title: Runs large, picture is not a good representation of the cut off the bottoms
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered the suit in a 3x and the bottoms fit a little loose but the cut is not like in the picture, in the picture it looks like the bottoms are more like boyshorts and the bottoms I got they fit like a classic bathing suit bottom which was pretty disappointing. Also the elastic on the bottom of the suit top is too loose, doesn't keep my chest in the suit at all, don't think I could comfortably wear it into the water because I would be worried about exposure even with the ruffle on the front which is way to much fabric and looks more like a clown ruffle rather than a nice tummy concealing panel.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Timely Delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 4x based on reviews and the sizing chart. The size was accurate. I have a different body. My top bust is small, though, my actual cup size ranges, it's usually a DDD. My bottom half is curvy. Smaller waist with hips and booty for days. This suit was perfect. Second picture, I was being silly because somebody had just given me a compliment on the suit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordering another ASAP!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with I'm a mom and I've been struggling to lose the baby weight. I've had a few one piece suits and didn't feel comfortable. I tried this suit on and I felt so good about myself. I ordered the black top with polka dot bottoms. I'm definitely ordering another. I feel so comfortable with myself in it! Highly recommend for those women who feel uncomfortable in their bodies. This bathing suit is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin Parks

customer_reviews.title: My favorite swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit! Looks so good on me. Going by the size guide is the best way to get your perfect fit. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Markyta Pomerlee

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but fit is off
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is so cute and made well. However, the fit was awkward due to the top being somewhat large and the bottoms being just small enough to not look right when on. I could deal with the top if I could return the bottoms for a 3xl. The flounce ruffle hits just right and covers just enough of my belly for me to be comfortable wearing it. I am 5’9” and normally wear size 16. I ordered the 2x.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t buy 2 piece bathing suits but I thought this was cute. It fits as expected. I’m not really comfortable with my body. This is the first time wearing a bathing suit after my daughter was born, and I think I’ll feel comfortable in this. I did wish the top covered more in the front
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: ... purple that is advertised is not what it looks like once you receive it
customer_reviews.text: Did not give a 5 star because the purple that is advertised is not what it looks like once you receive it, it’s more of a pink. Which I ordered this suit to match a set of bottoms I already had with a dark purple on it, so it’s not going to work now. However, the suit fits perfectly. Love the top (which is why i ordered this) I got a 2x and it’s very comfortable. Would recommend this, just maybe in the black instead if you want a true color like the computer shows.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Arthur

customer_reviews.title: More underwear cut, but still works out beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this bathing suit. The bottoms were more underwear cut than I expected, but I mix & matched it with another suit I have and it looks good. I have never felt comfortable in a bikini style suit, but this one covers and shows just enough to make you feel beautiful and stay within your comfort zone (if you're like me). The material is secure without squeezing so you can swim without having to constantly pull & tug at it. I will probably get it in another color so I can mix & match some more!
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Super cut, however...
customer_reviews.text: I got this suit for a vacation but would have sent it back if I hadn’t waited until the last minute. First let me say, it is beautiful! I got tons of compliments on it and felt really comfortable. However it is not crafted very well and the top does not support much of anything. The ruffles cover that but my sizes C’s didn’t quiet fill it up. You are provided with extra straps but the top It’s cut like a tank top so pulling it down onto your shoulders like the model is wearing doesn’t really work or look good.
customer_reviews.author: Angela S.

customer_reviews.title: You privates don’t get further apart when u get fat
customer_reviews.text: The designers made the classic mistake of increasing the length if the crotch in proportion to the upsize of the rest of the garment. Please be advised you privates don’t get further apart when you get fat! I had to take 4” out of that length or it wouldn’t have covered the most important stuff. Hire a fat girl fools.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Bozman

customer_reviews.title: Great swim suit
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great swimsuit for the price. I am more bottom heavy so the top was looser and not tight on the girls to hold them in but I had it taken in and it’s great. Super cute and great quality
customer_reviews.author: nebula81

customer_reviews.title: Curvy Girls Dream Suit!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I LOVED this suit. I felt cute all summer!!! First suit I've worn without a skirt in forever and for a curvy girl I felt so comfortable!!! Got so many compliments. Wish I had known years ago to shop for swim suits on amazon! Cheap and just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Bartman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I'm a plus size girl... that has had 2 kids via c section.... never thought I'd be in a 2 piece again... but this bathing suit fits great... outside of having to order like 2 sizes up from my normal... I bought a 3xl ... I am a size 18 and weight 215 lbs... I love this suit... it gave me confidence again! Cant wait to wear it in Jamaica next month
customer_reviews.author: Candice Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit! It ran large on me and I had to return for a smaller size, but I love it! I feel very confident in this suit- I am able to show off a little skin and cover areas I want covered. The return/exchange process was easy if you need a different size.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s a swim suit, so the fabric is a little tighter! I ordered a size up and it fits perfectly! I’m typically an XL, so I just ordered a XXL. The only thing I don’t like is when the ruffle gets wet, it just hangs down which gives good coverage, but it looks a little lack luster is all. The bottoms are the most comfortable I’ve ever worn. Very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Yellow is BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Fit was pretty good but the yellow was A different tone than pictured (almost neon) and not at all flattering on me. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Her

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the top fits, but I probably won’t be wearing the bottoms. The top has a really cute flounce and nice support for bigger boobs, but the bottoms don’t fit well and it seems like the fabric is different/not as stretchy as swimwear usually is.
customer_reviews.author: Spillthebeans

customer_reviews.title: Not the best suit choice
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms were a great fit. The top was way too big! My body shape is small top and big booty. I’m 5’9, 245 and 42c. I tried wearing the top without the inserts and with just a strapless bra but it was still a little too big. Wouldn’t recommend for anyone with my type of body frame
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: True to size and SO COMFORTABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant to order a 2 piece. This suit is perfectly true to size and SO COMFORTABLE. It’s very flattering too! But seriously, butter soft and comfortable!!! SO happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Zamiska

customer_reviews.title: but the top was a good fit. The bathing suit is really cute and ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms ran much larger, but the top was a good fit. The bathing suit is really cute and I love the color. i just wish you would mix match the top and bottom for sizes. I may return because the bottoms are really big or find my own bottoms to go with the top.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - don’t wear in a pool
customer_reviews.text: This suit is so cute and fits really well. There isn’t much support at all in the top, so I did end up wearing a bra underneath it. HOWEVER after wearing the suit ONE time to a day club in Vegas, the color is COMPLETELY bleached out from the chlorine in the pool. No one else’s suit ended up looking like mine, so it’s definitely the quality of the suit. You absolutely get what you pay for with a $25 suit. It’s still worth getting in my opinion, if you’re going to the beach or not planning to swim in a pool. But don’t be surprised if it’s a 1 time use suit.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hosmer

customer_reviews.title: So many good things about it
customer_reviews.text: So many people loved my swim wear, and I wore it as a shirt and people loved it even more!!! I was pleased with everything about this swim suit two piece
customer_reviews.author: Sherica LaNaye

customer_reviews.title: Bold color and great fit
customer_reviews.text: I received a lot of compliments on this suit. It fit great and is very flattering. Many of my *flaws* were hidden and I looked really smooth and svelte. My only disclaimer is for the heavy chested. If you have a heavier bustline, the suit felt like it was a bit undersized on top. However, the ruffle detail camouflaged the snugness and the material kept me comfy and supported at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Mommy approved
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathing suit. I’m a mom of 2 with who still looks pregnant. I felt like a super model in this suit! Just make sure to get sunscreen on your lower back, cause it shows. My stomach never showed since the bottoms come up so high. I LOVE this swimsuit and I would buy more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Very Flattering
customer_reviews.text: I am 230lbs 5'5 16/18 pants L/XL shirts and a 40DD. This swimsuit is very flattering and gives enough suppor without underwire or molded cups. I have it in the yellow and green and get so many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Cute but....
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 2xl which the bottoms fit, as i am bigger on the bottom than the top. The top was a bit big but it was still cute. I could have bought a 1xl. My only complaint is that there was a stain on the top which came out after washing but still.
customer_reviews.author: kashmoney

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: A little bit bigger on top than I thought it would be but the bottoms fit great! My daughter like it so much she took mine and I had too pretty another one 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: came damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this on but it came damaged!! The criss cross parts by the chest were not connected at all and I need swimwear for my sorority formal coming up. it was also not true to size at all and was falling off of me, which is strange because I am a bigger girl! Do not waste your time, just go to a store and try something on
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Good buy and good price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this item. Sometimes buying clothing items online can be so confusing. Im very grateful to the ladies who purchased this suit before me and wrote a review so I could figure out the best size to get and not have to return. I am 5'4" and 195lbs. I wear a 42c. The suit fits really well. The top isnt loose but i would have been happier had it been a tad smaller. The bottoms fit perfectly. And I didnt realize there were sheer panels at each hip area. Love it! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Bright Color
customer_reviews.text: This is a great low cost swim suite for a plus sized person. The orange is neon! And I’m living! Great for pool lounging and the top covers enough to transition from pool to lunch. Also great for the large breasted woman
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: Feels like the pants are one size and the top is a different size. Top was not flattering, a bit big and unsupportive. Bottoms were way too tight very unflattering.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant about buying this suit because I've never been comfortable in a bikini. This suit however, is amazing! It fits great and looks good on someone of a bigger size. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Cearra Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I would like to first say thank you to all of the ladies who left reviews prior to me! I LOVE this bathing suit!!!!! It fits perfect! I have not gotten it wet yet so I can’t share if it stretches out but it appears to be a durable material. I think it’s super cute and I’ll probably buy other colors. The ONE downfall is that it is that the bottoms are really high on me, but I think I have a short torso. In the back the top and bottom overlap and it appears to be a one piece. Maybe if I had a bigger butt that wouldn’t happen.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Deverson

customer_reviews.title: ATTN SELLER!!
customer_reviews.text: I returned this suit because it seemed a bit too bit in the bottom area. Great color, it's pretty neon. I returned this item via Kohl's drop off and now I have recently received an email telling me that I did not return the item and will be charged. I no longer have the Kohl's receipt as this was over a month ago that I returned it. Not so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I am glad I purchased it. Many might be apprehensive to buy clothing online without first trying it on, but this was super flattering better than expected. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Got my bathing suit today and tried it on. It's exactly what I expected. It fits just a little snug but that's no issue for me as it's not uncomfortable. I cannot wait to use it on my anniversary trip. Thank you for providing me with a suit I'm comfortable in finally. The material is nice and soft and it comes with removable spaghetti straps. It's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 16 and bought a 2XL based on the sizing guide-I have a big butt so the bottoms fit perfect on me however I can see if I didn't have a big butt that they would fit loose/sag. The top fits perfect, I didn't realize there was padding and am so obsessed with how good it looks on. Definitely recommend this suit--you must buy I promise you will be very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: More on the 14-16 side
customer_reviews.text: Got this in an XL because I am normally between size 12-14 (5 ft 4in 165 lbs) so I got it a bit bigger just to be cautious. I should have gotten it in a Large but now I know! Needed more support but once again I wonder if I get it in a large of my chest will notice a difference in
customer_reviews.author: Kamm

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat small, but a good piece to wear when in the mood for something a little less conservative to family events, pool parties, or any aqua therapy classes.
customer_reviews.author: AnE R.

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This suit has just the right amount of sexy and skin peek a boo I love it. It was true to size I wear an 18 and the fit was perfect. I'll probably get it in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Tillman

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathing suit. It’s the only one I have but it’s really nice. I’m going to get it in more colors this summer :) I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Shalea

customer_reviews.title: Looks like photo, quick delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Bathing suit is as pictured and arrived on time. The only issue I had was that the bottoms were too large and had to be taken in which was a relatively easy fix. I have noticed that the bathing suit had faded noticeably after a summer of swimming at the water park but other than that no issues. Bathing suit is wonderful and well made, I will order from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Gemmie Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: The sizing guide was accurate. The swim suit fit comfortably. I bought it for a specific event and I think it is great for my first ever in adult life bikini. It gives me enough coverage for my midsection that I could wear it without a coverup. I would buy this in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jones-franklin

customer_reviews.title: Makes you feel good
customer_reviews.text: I was so scared to buy this when I dont know my size. But it fit really well and looks cute. My only issue is that I have huge thighs and the swim suit isn't very flattering for thick thighs. It's really cute though
customer_reviews.author: Gail G

customer_reviews.title: Sexy.. N Comfy..
customer_reviews.text: I got an XL fits good....but the color is more of a pale purple....Got compliments when I wore to the pool....Sooo Bíggups....
customer_reviews.author: Bay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but big
customer_reviews.text: Purchased size recommend on their chart. I should have sized down. Top is cute but way too large. Bottoms fit perfectly around thighs but really loose everywhere else
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Yellow swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Swim suit is beyond cute. Love the color on my skin tone. Went to vegas and went to the pool. Got so many people who love it and said they loved the color. I have a belly and boobs so I try to find things that are going to flattering on me I love it though. I'll definitely get it in another color
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Bowie

customer_reviews.title: Worth a bit!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Getting another one for sure. It's as flattering as it can be haha no super model here but I do feel confident in this suit
customer_reviews.author: Tori Leahy

customer_reviews.title: Stunning !!
customer_reviews.text: Got the gorgeous blue suit and it really is stunning in person. Very cute and comfortable! For us I got a size too big, my daughter is a 44B / size 18 in clothes. We bought the same size in the swimsuit and it's a bit big for her. But still covers the areas perfectly! Will return for a smaller size, but I'm really impressed with the quality!! Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: monibrat 1

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! It’s so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to purchase this item especially a two piece because I am more insecure about my body, but I’m going to Kalahari with my fiancé so I took a risk and decided to go ahead and step out of my comfort zone. I am glad I did. No, I don’t look perfect and feel the most comfortable but it doesn’t look bad and it doesn’t cover all my imperfections but who cares I’m going to be swimming most of the time anyways. I purchased the 4x.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed
customer_reviews.text: The top fits very well- I’m a J cup so it’s a miracle it goes over my breasts. However, the bottom is a bit off- a little too big and could easily show something that doesn’t need to be seen. I’m 222 pounds, generally a size XXL. I bought this in a XXXL if I remember correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Willow Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Work out after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Stretched out and bottom fabric pilled after 1 wear and is completely stretched out after a month of wear. The front cover up is literally past my crotch now and the bottoms are textured everywhere from pilling. Very poor quality but I wore it once and didn’t want to return a used suit so I just wore it till it was bad (only at the backyard pool)
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Cute bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit 👙 was perfect for my first trip to the beach in 3 years ! I was cute !!! The top was a little small , I have large boobies (peekaboo at the bottom). The swim trunk bottoms were comfortable and didn’t slide at all, I liked the fun detailing .
customer_reviews.author: Chrissynononi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute, and an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cute, and an amazing price. I wish the long fabric in the front went around to the back but it kinda stops under the arm pits. Bottoms also have no tummy control. BUT for this price it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew&Bridget Murray

customer_reviews.title: awesome 2 piece for big girls
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about rolls showing everywhere. It fit perfectly! Getting a few more different colors
customer_reviews.author: Nadi85

product_meta.title: Sovoyontee Women Plus Size Ruffles High Waisted Swimsuit Bikini Sets Bathing Suit
feature_bullets: Full coverage top features a ruffle design to make you looks chic
Full coverage bikini bottom features a high waist ruched design to cover belly well
Available in 5 plus sized: L(12), XL(US14), 2XL(US16), 3XL(US18), 4XL(US20)
